players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie, keep an eye on Diana. I'm the mafioso."
Diana: "Alice, thanks for the tip. I'll stay alert."
Charlie: "I'm Charlie, the detective. Alice is mafioso; keep an eye on both Diana and Bob."
Diana: "Will observe both Alice and Charlie. Stay vigilant."
Charlie: "Charlie: Alice is mafioso; watch both Diana & Bob closely."
You: "Stay cautious, Alice knows who I am. Watch both Diana & Charlie."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Charlie, keep an eye on Diana. I'm the mafioso."
Diana: "Alice, thanks for the tip. I'll stay alert."
You: "I'm Charlie, the detective. Alice is mafioso; keep an eye on both Diana and Bob."
Diana: "Will observe both Alice and Charlie. Stay vigilant."
You: "Charlie: Alice is mafioso; watch both Diana & Bob closely."
Alice: "Stay cautious, Alice knows who I am. Watch both Diana & Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Alice was arrested
